<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Instances of this class represent a single low-level machine</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instruction.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst/#a6fc00691cf17959a625009d21b002f45">MCInst</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Opcode = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// These flags could be used to pass some info from one target subcomponent</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to another, for example, from disassembler to asm printer. The values of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the flags have any sense on target level only (e.g. prefixes on x86).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Flags = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
